title: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley looks effortlessly chic in a polo neck and silk skirt
text:
She recently put her Malibu beach house on the market for $20 million.

And Rosie Huntington-Whiteley was pictured in nearby Beverley Hills on Thursday, waiting for the parking valet to return her car while doing a spot of filming.

While the model, 32, stood with her cup of coffee a videographer held up her camera to Rosie, who looked typically chic for her outing.

Chic: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley was pictured in nearby Beverley Hills on Thursday, waiting for the parking valet to return her car while doing a spot of filming

Rosie was rocking a cosy stone-coloured turtle neck teamed polo neck teamed with a champagne silk skirt and a pair of oversized black sunglasses.

The mother-of-one styled her classic ensemble with a pair of elegant strappy white heels, which boosted her already statuesque frame.

Rosie wore her blonde tresses in a straight flowing style, while highlighting her pretty features with soft touches of make-up and a muted red lip.

Cup of joe! While the model, 32, stood with her cup of coffee a videographer held up her camera to Rosie, who looked typically chic for her outing

Earthy tones: Rosie was rocking a cosy stone-coloured turtle neck teamed polo neck teamed with a champagne silk skirt and a pair of oversized black sunglasses

Rosie has been in a long-term relationship with Jason since 2010 and the couple welcomed son Jack, two, into the world in June 2017.

In June, the model spoke candidly about the impact of motherhood on her confidence as she graced the June cover of Harper's Bazaar magazine.

She said: 'Since becoming a mum, I've felt so much more confident within my own skin and much more confident about who I am. It's been life-changing.'

The model previously opened up about her relationship with the action star to Elle Australia in February.

Glam: The mother-of-one styled her classic ensemble with a pair of elegant strappy white heels, which boosted her already statuesque frame

Bombshell: Rosie wore her blonde tresses in a straight flowing style, while highlighting her pretty features with soft touches of make-up and a muted red lip

'We just kind of get on with things. We're pretty normal - we're not leaving restaurants separately,' she said. 'People want to live on camera 24/7 but that's not us.'

Statham was most recently seen on the big screen with Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson in the Fast And Furious spin-off Hobbs & Shaw.

Earlier this month, it was reported that he is set to reunite with British director Guy Ritchie who gave him his first movie break in the 1998 film Lock, Stock And Two Smoking Barrels.

According to Deadline.com, the project will be a revenge-based action thriller based on the 2004 French film Le Convoyeur.
description: While the model, 32, stood with her cup of coffee a videographer held up her camera to Rosie, who looked typically chic for her outing.
